amendment.description: To establish a small business child care grant program.

vote.text: Amendment SA 102 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 102 proposed by Senator Roberts to Amendment SA 100. (consideration: CR S890-893; text: CR S892-893) To establish a small business child care grant program.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 102 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 102 proposed by Senator Roberts to Amendment SA 100.
